t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - The private label Mama Bear sells baby wipes, baby food, diaper pail refills and baby laundry detergent. In 2018, the brand began selling newborn through size six diapers, which were previously offered by the Amazon Elements private brand before their removal from the site in 2014.

t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: In some situations, an advertiser may need to leverage the “Amazon” logo either alone (third-party usage) or in a lockup with their own logo (co-branding). Any use of the Amazon logo must be approved and reviewed in all cases. Please send request for approval with examples of proposed usage ...

t: Denifery on Amazon.com Marketplace - SellerRatings.com
s: Denifery is trusted by over a thousand Amazon.com customers in the US. They have been selling on the Amazon.com marketplace since 2018. They offer hundreds of products.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Creating and maintaining a Brand Store is free, and you do not need to advertise on Amazon to create a Brand Store. Once you create a Brand Store, you can showcase your products, brand story, and lifestyle content to engage shoppers.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 1 day ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.
